articles.title: UK hands sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius - BBC.com
articles.description: In a historic move, the UK gives up sovereignty of a strategic group of islands in the Indian Ocean.
articles.content:
The UK has announced it is giving up sovereignty of a remote but strategically important cluster of islands in the Indian Ocean after more than half a century.

articles.title: Mexico: Soldiers open fire on migrant truck, killing 6 - DW (English)
articles.description: Mexican soldiers fired guns on a truck carrying 33 migrants, killing six and injuring ten. The migrants hailed from Egypt, Nepal, Cuba, India and Pakistan.
articles.content:
Mexican soldiers opened fire on a group of 33 migrants, killing six, said the defense ministry in a statement on Wednesday.
